chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21 5G has the following issue:
The phone won't turn on.
Thank you for your help,

Salve agente,

Il venditore non può elaborare la restituzione a causa del seguente problema:
Altro.
Ha aggiunto ulteriori dettagli nel seguente messaggio: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be only have micro-scratches on the shell. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made in the event our repair team is unable to fix the device. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

But the condition of the device is not a warranty exclusion.

From your proposal we have the doubt that you have already sent it as such.

Regards,
Angela from the Back Care Team

Salve agente,

Il venditore non può elaborare la restituzione a causa del seguente problema:
Altro.
Ha aggiunto ulteriori dettagli nel seguente messaggio: Dear Backcare,

We understand that the condition of the device is not a warranty exclusion. However, as mentioned, the device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be only have micro-scratches on the shell. The customer has had the device for a almost a year. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

However, we are amenable to a €30 deduction instead, in the event our repair team is unable to fix the device. Kindly check with the customer on this and in the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

Proceed with the repair, if it is not repairable we will ask the customer if he agrees.

Regards,
Angela from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue. Kindly ask the customer if he is agreeable with our offer. Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

the customer does not accept.

Refund in full or send an identical device.

Regards,
Angela from the Back Care Team

Salve agente,

Il venditore non può elaborare la restituzione a causa del seguente problema:
Pacco e prodotto danneggiati durante il trasporto.
Ha aggiunto ulteriori dettagli nel seguente messaggio: Dear Backcarte,

Upon closer inspection of the device, we have discovered that the device has suffered severe damage to the housing of the shell. This is way beyond what could be considered a "good" condition. The customer had the device for almost a year when they complained of screen issues. The multiple dents on the corners of the phone indicate that the device has sustained multiple fall damage. 

As such, we must declare this phone out of warranty. 

Please relook into this case as the condition of the phone is very bad.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

Returning the device to the customer

Regards,
Angela from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

We have informed our logistics partner regarding the situation and will update you promptly.

Regards,
JH

Dear Backcare,

The parcel has been shipped back to the customer.

Regards,
RK
